Uses of Class
id.kaytrust.core.utils.exception.JwtVerifyException

  • Packages that use JwtVerifyException 
    Package Description
    id.kaytrust.core.identity.base  
    id.kaytrust.core.identity.ethereum.client  
    id.kaytrust.core.utils.didconnect  

    • Uses of JwtVerifyException in id.kaytrust.core.identity.base

      Methods in id.kaytrust.core.identity.base that throw JwtVerifyException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean IdentityConsumer.checkIdentityToken(String jwt, String audience, String capability)
      First, the process verifies if a "jwt" contains a required "audience" (specified in the "aud" field in the jwt); if so the did (subject field of the jwt), the device's address (processed from the "iss" field in the jwt) and the capability ("cap" field in the jwt) are extracted from the jwt.

    • Uses of JwtVerifyException in id.kaytrust.core.identity.ethereum.client

      Methods in id.kaytrust.core.identity.ethereum.client that throw JwtVerifyException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean EthereumIdentityConsumerImpl.checkIdentityToken(String jwt, String audience, String capability)
      First, the process verifies if a "jwt" contains a required "audience" (specified in the "aud" field in the jwt); if so the did (subject field of the jwt), the device's address (processed from the "iss" field in the jwt) and the capability ("cap" field in the jwt) are extracted from the jwt.

    • Uses of JwtVerifyException in id.kaytrust.core.utils.didconnect

      static <T> JwtPayload<T> Secp256k1Utils.verifyJwTokenSecp256k1(String jwtToken, String aud)
